I do not do any type of protection thing as I feel there is no need.

  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: mrscaptainjack2 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 20, 2009 1:20 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Poll=



    Can I take a little poll? I'm wondering how many of us are doing som=
e sort of protective meditation or prayer before we use the box? (BTW, I am=
 NOT a religious person, but I ask for protection anyway.) Also wondering, =
how many of us have noticed an increase in seemingly psychic abilities or s=
trange happenings after starting to use the box?
